SEARCH
Package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel

Class PreferencesViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel.PreferencesViewModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
DefaultLifecycleObserver, LifecycleObserver
public class PreferencesViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to some subset of the current preferences state. While PreferencesRepository provides access to the full SharedPreferences of the app, this class takes the approach of using Transformations.map(LiveData, Function1) to provide LiveData-based read-only access to individual preference values. This approach is of most use when an instance of a PreferenceFragmentCompat subclass is used to modify SharedPreferences, and the preference values need to be used (but not modified) in other UI controllers.

    LiveData<Boolean>
    getSelectableTextPreference()
